DC CODE ยง 26-1111

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A licensee may surrender a license by sending to the Superintendent the license and a written statement that the license is surrendered.
The surrender of a license does not affect any civil or criminal liability of a licensee for acts committed before the license was surrendered.

title.text: Banks and Other Financial Institutions. (Refs & Annos)
